__e: First thing you learn about life on board a submarine...
- So, take it from someone who has spent incrementally more time with him than you:
Either I end this now or you learn firsthand what dying looks like.
I was saving myself from your beatings, you witch.

Trust me, life's a lot easier if you learn to tell the truth.
When you get hungry, never turn down an offer of food.
Yeah I will do from where you learn dance?
They learned what you're about to learn, the hard way.
And while you're at it, learn the difference between. "We have a problem" and "You have a problem."
